name: List
title: Gcloud
Dns
Record
List
description: Record::List is a special case Array with additional values.

methods.name: token
title: Gcloud
Dns
Record
List#token
methods.description: If not empty, indicates that there are more records that match the request and this value should be passed to continue.

methods.name: token=
title: Gcloud
Dns
Record
List#token=
methods.description: If not empty, indicates that there are more records that match the request and this value should be passed to continue.

methods.name: initialize
title: Gcloud
Dns
Record
List#initialize
methods.description: Create a new Record::List with an array of Record instances.

methods.name: next?
title: Gcloud
Dns
Record
List#next?
methods.description: Whether there a next page of records.

methods.name: all
title: Gcloud
Dns
Record
List#all
methods.description: Retrieves all records by repeatedly loading pages until #next? returns false. Returns the list instance for method chaining.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
dns = gcloud.dns
zone = dns.zone "example-com"
records = zone.records.all # Load all pages of records
